Ammunition Stance

Requirement: A weapon with the Ammunition trait.

Stashing extra ammo in your palm, in your weapon, or otherwise close at hand, you prepare to unleash a storm of shots at the enemy.

Pros

Overload

  • By expending an extra piece of ammunition, which breaks when used, each of your attacks deal an additional 1d4 weapon damage.

Ammo Scavenger

  • You can pick up ammunition at your feet, spent or otherwise, as a free action.
  • When picked up, these can be fired with a +2 bonus to hit with these this turn.
  • Broken ammo otherwise cannot be fired.

Bullseye

  • When you hit a target with ammunition, that target gains a weak point until the end of your next turn. Any creature can choose to aim a weapon attack at that impact point. The attack is made with a -2 to hit, but if hit, the target takes 2 @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.R54LQEKSDXNQ3N75]{Bleeding}, as well as the attack's damage.

Cons

Spray and Pray

  • All attacks cost one extra ammunition.
